article_title: Trump Speech St. Louis Missouri LIVE STREAM
article_text:
Donald Trump will be holding a campaign rally today in St. Louis, Missouri at the Peabody Opera House. It is highly likely that Trump’s speech will reflect on his performance at last night’s GOP debate, as well as his reception of Ben Carson‘s endorsement earlier today.

Watch above, via Right Side Broadcasting.

[image via screengrab]
